sentences.en: [as modifier]an Old Firm match.
sentences.cn: 一场“老字号”足球俱乐部比赛。

sentences.en: a pair of old shoes
sentences.cn: 一双旧鞋

sentences.en: an old man
sentences.cn: 一位老人

sentences.en: Ann Bradley dispels the old wives' tales and gives the medical facts.
sentences.cn: 安·布拉德利破除迷信，给出了医学事实。

sentences.en: any old room would have done.
sentences.cn: 随便一间房就行。

sentences.en: Are you older than Sally?
sentences.cn: 你比萨莉大吗？

sentences.en: As a group, today's old people are still relatively deprived.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，当今的老年人依然相对贫困。

sentences.en: At 54 years old her energy and looks are magnificent.
sentences.cn: 她54岁了，精力和气色都非常好。

sentences.en: Come on over, we've got lots of the old gang here.
sentences.cn: 过来吧，好多老朋友都在这儿。

sentences.en: Douglas was a 29-year-old journeyman fighter, erratic in his previous fights.
sentences.cn: 道格拉斯29岁，是个技术不错的拳击手，在以前的比赛中发挥不太稳定。

sentences.en: he was more reticent than of old.
sentences.cn: 他比过去更加沉默。

sentences.en: How old are you?
sentences.cn: 你多大年纪？

sentences.en: I shall be 26 years old on Friday next.
sentences.cn: 下周五我就26岁了.

sentences.en: I’m not coming skating. I’m too old for that now.
sentences.cn: 我不去玩溜冰，我现在太老玩不动了。

sentences.en: it was easier in the old days.
sentences.cn: 在以前要容易多了。

sentences.en: one of our oldest traditions
sentences.cn: 我们最古老的传统之一

sentences.en: She acted in her firstfilm when she was 13 years old.
sentences.cn: 13岁时她出演了她的电影处女作。

sentences.en: She learned to draw by tracing pictures out of old storybooks.
sentences.cn: 她通过描摹旧故事书上的图画学会了画画。

sentences.en: She's 87 years old, and a one-time member of the Ziegfeld Follies.
sentences.cn: 她现年87岁，曾经是齐格菲尔时事讽刺剧团的成员之一。

sentences.en: Some of the houses around here are very old.
sentences.cn: 这里有些房子年代已经很久远了。

sentences.en: That story’s as old as the hills (= extremely old ).
sentences.cn: 那个故事非常古老。

sentences.en: the bad old days of incoherence and irresponsibility.
sentences.cn: 过去那些松散、不负责任的糟糕日子。

sentences.en: The car’s getting old now, and things are starting to go wrong with it.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车现在越来越旧，已经开始出毛病了。

sentences.en: The fusty old establishment refused to recognise the demand for popular music.
sentences.cn: 这一古板的老旧机构拒绝承认人们对流行音乐的需求。

sentences.en: The town's old quayside is collapsing after years of neglect.
sentences.cn: 镇上老码头区多年来疏于维护,快要塌陷了.

sentences.en: they knew him of old.
sentences.cn: 他们认识他很久了。

sentences.en: they've dropped things just any old how.
sentences.cn: 他们把东西随意丢置。

sentences.en: we are less confident than in the good old days.
sentences.cn: 我们不像从前好日子里那么自信了。

sentences.en: We ran across some old friends in the village.
sentences.cn: 我们在村里偶然碰见了一些老朋友。

sentences.en: We spent years travelling around in a rusty old van.
sentences.cn: 我们多年来都开着一辆生锈的旧货车四处旅行。

sentences.en: What we see at Westminster is a tired old ritual.
sentences.cn: 我们在威斯敏斯特教堂看到的是一种经年不变的古旧仪式。

sentences.en: Xandra is an athletic 36-year-old with a 21-year-old's body.
sentences.cn: 36岁的汉德拉身体健壮，有着21岁小伙子的体能。

sentences.en: You’re old enough to get your own breakfast now.
sentences.cn: 你现在已经长大，可以自己弄早餐了。

phrases.tran_cn: （用于表示无特殊个体）任意一个

phrases.phrase: old enough to be someone's father (或 mother)
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)老得可以当某人的父亲（或母亲）
老笑话，听熟了的笑话；旧日支配者（old one的复数形式）
旧世界；东半球东半球（指欧、亚、非三洲）
(非正式)（苏格兰）“老字号”（凯尔特及流浪者足球俱乐部的别称）［单指其中之一或指两者］

phrases.phrase: you can't put an old head on young shoulders
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)你不能指望年轻人有老人的头脑

trans.tran_cn: （多少）岁，年纪大的，陈旧的，古老的，从前的，原来的，结识久的，（表示亲昵）老…
trans.tran_en: used to talk about how long a person or thing has lived or existed
something that is old has existed or been used for a long time
